title: Obama / McCain Debate backdrop
content:
So did anyone happen to spot the Brush Script BODY COPY below the original “We the People” in the blue backdrop of the debate? That was the highlight IMO.

 [‹ Wanted: Photos of the Bauer Type Foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121122509/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49947 "Go to previous forum topic") [New Bringhurst book ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121122509/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49899 "Go to next forum topic")
author: johnbutler

comments.content: That wasn’t brush script; brush script was what SNL used in their parody of the debate.

I thought it was P22s Declaration.

ChrisL

I seem to recall seeing Vivaldi was in the blue backdrop.  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=vivaldi](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121122509/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=vivaldi "http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=vivaldi")
